original_title: The Freddie Mercury Story: Who Wants to Live Forever?
overview: The last years of Freddie Mercury (1946-1991), rock legend and frontman of Queen, a band that conquered the world of music in the seventies and eighties: what was his lifestyle and the path that led him to a tragic death due to AIDS when he was only 46 years old.
title: The Freddie Mercury Story: Who Wants to Live Forever?
